messages.subject: was Christian something or other, now spanking..
messages.messageBody:
<with the man on the bench. He said to me, "My mom scared me." I said,
"She was worried about you because you wandered off." He just looked at
me and said, "No. She doesn't care about me. She doesn't even care
whether I grow up." I didn't know what to say to him. He was about
four. She didn't look at him again until she was ready to go home.>
That kind of stuff kills me. I just think of some of my closest friends who prayed and prayed for a child and had trouble conceiving (or one friend who's baby died in her arms, born at 27 weeks) and I just can't understand how someone could treat their own child with such carelessness. Sad, really sad! Kelli
